item.title: Bloging with github, hugo and gitbook
item.author: Novi Ardi
item.description:
Today i use GitBook and Hugo as my blogging platform.

  • Hugo as static generator and gitbook to write my markdown file
  • Github, i put the static file in github.
  • GitBook as markdown manager
